name: secrets-for-strings
description: For each given string, generates a strong secret based on the conditions selected and makes them available through secret variables
author: Utkarsh Shigihalli

inputs.name: names
inputs.label: List of keys/strings to generate secrets for
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a list of keys/strings to generate the secrets for. Each key can be separated by `,`, `;`, `|` or a newline. The secret generated for each key will be available via a secret variable which you can use it in other tasks. E.g. Secret generated for key `azure.sqldb.password` can be accessed using $(azure.sqldb.password)

inputs.name: length
inputs.label: Length
inputs.helpMarkDown: Length of the generated secret. If you do not provide any value, this defaults to 12

inputs.name: useNumbers
inputs.label: Use numeric characters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use numeric characters (`0123456789`) in the generated secret.

inputs.name: useSpecialChars
inputs.label: Use special characters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use special characters (`~!@#$%^&()_+-={}[];\',.`) in the generated secret.

inputs.name: exclude
inputs.label: Characters to exclude
inputs.helpMarkDown: Characters to be excluded from the secret. Example: `0~dA
